title: Cannot force connection to 2.4GhZ for IoT devices.
content:
Please please please support forcing of different Wi-Fi frequency bands once again (like Android used too). This is not a new request. This functionality used to exist.

Quick searching yields so many of the exact same requests:

https://support.google.com/googlenest/thread/634488?hl=en
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/14981665?hl=en
https://support.google.com/googlenest/thread/34299357?hl=en
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/49466375?hl=en
https://support.google.com/googlenest/thread/757788?hl=en
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/1402353?hl=en
https://support.google.com/googlenest/thread/611640?hl=en
